title: Burn rate alert
description: Compute burn rate after each budget check, project end-of-period spend. Alert via log, response headers (X-Budget-Daily-Percent), and optional webhook (async, deduplicated to 1 per 5 min per agent). Implements the existing unused alert_at_percent field.
acceptance_criteria: New internal/alert package with burn rate calculation and webhook dispatch
Budget struct extended with alert_webhook URL field
After budget check, computes burn rate and projects end-of-period spend
Adds X-Budget-Daily-Percent response header when budget configured
Optional webhook fires async, deduplicated to max 1 per 5 min per agent
All tests pass, go vet clean
